snippet.title: WhatRogue: Exile Land丨A new roguelike strategy card game！
snippet.description:
The free demo of "WhatRogue: Exile Land" is now available on Steam. In addition to Chapter 1, a new map and new monsters in Chapter 2 are added in the demo! Feel free to try it out and put it on your wishlist!
Steam store page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3077400/_/
#games #cardgame #steam #indiegame #roguelike
